replies.body: As the number of existing champions increases the chances of getting the skin we want on sale is always decreasing...isn't it the time to get one more skin and one more champion on sale each sale?
Please, Rito, do this. It is getting too extreme. Oh, and GET ZAC A NEW SKIN. {{item:3070}} {{champion:154}} {{item:3070}}
Either Tuxedo Zac or "Zac'o'lantern" where he's orange and has a little candle inside him.
i agree get a tuxedo zac skin bc he does mention that he should get a sait as he says as he walks "i should get a suit" so i think a gentalmen zac woulld be awsome
Gentleman zac would be an epic next ultimate skin!!
I want a straw-hat skin for Zac!
Agreed.
Hey,if you go to {{champion:4}} page on the champion's page, there seems to be a black smoke that comes out of no where. He's the only champion that has this. What is it?

There's seven champs that have this.
Cassiopeia
Hecarim
LeBlanc
Lissandra
Twisted Fate
Xerath
Zed

Cassiopeia is a snake. Snakes die if they get stepped on. People die if they get stepped on. People dying when they get stepped on are usually trampled by horses. Horses. Ponies. Hecarim is the best pony. He gets a blue ribbon every time.
Ribbons. LeBlanc's costume is some capes and some ribbons. Leblanc is also a witch. But not an Ice Witch. Lissandra, on the other hand...
Lissandra is blue. Some cards are blue. TF's cards are blue a third of the time. TF goes in the mid lane. Who goes mid every other game in the LCS? Zed.
Zed's ult gives him three shadows in a triangle shape with a red dot like an eye in the middle. Triangle shape with an eye in the middle?

Half life 3 confirmed.

Cassiopeia
Hecarim
LeBlanc
Lissandra
Twisted Fate
Xerath
Zed

All seven are mid laners (even Hec, originally). Seven characters in "Ao_Shin".

Rito confirmed - **Ao Shin** is next champion.
Rito pls

O.o too spooky for me
Why teemo no have one?
He does not need smoke to define him,**HE IS EVIL**!!!
Oh Sh!tzle thought my computer was over heating or something lol.
Well Ravenborn LeBlanc has been already shown on lol leaks. I wonder whats next. :D
{{champion:64}} I don't see it.
{{champion:127}} I don't see it either.
{{champion:161}} i can
Might be it's a preview for the Champions who deserves Harrowing skins for this year ?
GHOSTLY XERATH *runs screaming down street*
TF's cards are wite, and Zed and Hecarim have something behind them that wasn't there before...

10000 cast range lol!
So I had just bought Zed yesterday (the 15th) and now he is on sale. FML!{{champion:238}}
Dude rememebr the rule... You never every but shitt with RP on a monday or wednesday.
If you buy a champ with RP and if the champ is on sale within the next 2 weeks. You can submit a request to support for the difference back.You get (487 RP Back). :)
Are you serious???!!
Yup :3 {{champion:64}} to him
riot why cant we have Halloween skins? can you put them on sale pls.

Hey Rito,
Can you please bring back the champ and skin sales charts so we know whent to download RP.  Thanks

Download the RP. O.O
One of THOSE guys huh?
Agreed, I've gone from buying huge chunks of RP for the month to buying nothing since they cut those off completely =/

I WANT SCARLET POPPY!
RITO, PLEASE STOP PUTTING OVERRATED SKIN ON SALE LIKE STEEL LEGION LUX, WE ALL HAVE IT...
UNLESS THOSE WHO LIVES UNDER A ROCK.

Or maybe the rest of us want a skin that better fits her personality, as was promised to us two years ago.
